```{r}
train<-read.csv("train.csv", header=T, sep=",")
varlist<-c("Store","DayOfWeek", "Open", "Promo", "StateHoliday", "SchoolHoliday")
train[,varlist]<-lapply(train[,varlist], factor)
```

Change date into a date format and separate in 3 columns
```{r}
library(tidyr)
train$Date<-as.Date(paste(train$Date,sep="-"),format= "%Y-%m-%d")
train <- separate(train, Date, into = c("Year", "Month", 
                                                "Day"), sep="-")
date_num<-c("Year", "Month", "Day")
train[,date_num]<-lapply(train[,date_num],as.integer)
```

```{r}
sapply(train,class)
summary(train)
```
